I have problem during submiting to iwrb.fzk.de

I see problem-dialog:
"Job submission failed.
Reason: The operation is not allowed: Jdl VirtualOrganization attribute is different from delegated Proxy Virtual Organization"

Just a quesiton from me? 

Are the services at FZK and CNAF real WMS services? 
Or are these classical Resource Brokers? then it would not work!!!

Harald
I had the same problem as Mariusz. In the jsdl_test.jsdl on the CVS server the VO in <jsdl:JobProject> was set to dteam, after changing it to geclipse job submission worked.

1- Yes, the problem from Mariusz seems to be just a VO missmatch.
2- The iwrrb.fzk.de server is a gLite-3.0 WMS node, not a classical RB.
3- In the exception-log from Mathias i see that he is not authorized at CNAF ("User not authorized:"),
    and a strange error is reported at FZK,
    Error with openssl: Couldn't set the private key to be used for the SSL context
    (....) x509 certificate routines, function X509_check_private_key: 
    key values mismatch)) (...) Register job failed to LB server: iwrrb.fzk.de:9000
    edg_wll_RegisterJob (null)
    Looks like the connection to WMS succeeds but then fails by LB.

Testing myself, both at FZK and CNAF i get an axis exception earlier in the process:
    No client transport named 'https' found!
    
Attached a screenshot (sorry... could not select the text) of the error dialog.

BTW: the exception dialog is ~ 5 screens long and at the very bottom it offers me "more details"!!  ;-)

Created an attachment (id=64664)
Exception dialog by jobsubmission

I managed to subbmit JSDL job (jsdl_test.jsdl) to 
https://iwrrb.fzk.de:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server

(In reply to comment #5)
> Testing myself, both at FZK and CNAF i get an axis exception earlier in the
> process:
>     No client transport named 'https' found!
> 
> Attached a screenshot (sorry... could not select the text) of the error dialog.
> 

Same here.

Bingo, I now can confirm that there is some bad interaction between the SRM and Jobsubmission components regarding axis, which moreover depends on the initialization order:

After removing the stale SRM connection in the grid-project (ie, removing by hand the file ./Filesystems/.IWRSE-SRM.fs ) and starting geclipse I could submit jobs to FZK (not authorized in other RBs) and it even finished!
(although there are some exceptions regarding the decorators)

If i add an SRM connection after having submited a job, jobsubmission continues working.

However, if i quit geclipse, keeping the SRM connection, restart, and then i try to submit a job it fails with the error i posted above.
Please remark that the SRM connection is NOT working for me, see Bug #182578.

$ glite-wms-job-status https://iwrrb.fzk.de:9000/G5CRHMFaWr0BWadwoyIxDg
*************************************************************
BOOKKEEPING INFORMATION:

Status info for the Job : https://iwrrb.fzk.de:9000/G5CRHMFaWr0BWadwoyIxDg

Exit code:          0
Status Reason:      Job terminated successfully
Destination:        ce-fzk.gridka.de:2119/jobmanager-pbspro-sl4test
Submitted:          Wed Apr 25 23:30:19 2007 CEST
*************************************************************
moving to M4: this is an ongoing action item
